column5: Well headed off to bps to see the sale items with my son in tow,,,,big fishing fan he is,,all in all had a good time at bps and in the mall at the nascar speedway store,,,lots to do there! a couple pics taken with the phone,,, http://i149.photobucket.com/albums/s55/son...46/Image022.jpg hope this works,,lol he knows how to pic a lure to catch the big ones!! http://i149.photobucket.com/albums/s55/son...46/Image023.jpg       think i got it figured out,,lol
Looks like hes saying bring on the muskie in the last pic.lol
Looks like you both had a wonderful day... what a gem my nephew is !
We are to only hope he can catch fish better than the rest of us family members.
Hey cousin!  You finally decided to join, welcome!
